item.title: 10 to Life Podcast Is Now Live
item.description: The 10 to Life podcast launches with new episodes throughout the week. Join Annie Elise for true crime stories, insights, and community updates.

item.title: The 7M Social Media Cult!
item.description: A closer look at the 7M group and the claims surrounding its control over influencers’ lives and careers, as told through personal accounts and reports.

item.title: Horrific Case of Joleen Cummings Full of Red Flags
item.description: A closer look at the troubling case of Joleen Cummings, highlighting warning signs and the investigation that followed.

item.title: Ex-Wife Accused in Shocking Bahamas Plot
item.description: Authorities investigate a serious plot in the Bahamas, with an ex-wife named as a key suspect in the unfolding case.

item.title: Chad Daybell’s Prison Letters Finally Revealed
item.description: Recently released prison letters offer insight into Chad Daybell’s thoughts as his high-profile case continues to draw attention.

item.title: Pedro Hernandez Arrested in Etan Patz Case
item.description: A detailed look at the arrest of Pedro Hernandez in connection with the long-standing Etan Patz disappearance case.

item.title: Utah Student’s Abduction Sparks Dark Discovery
item.description: Authorities uncover new information after a Utah student’s reported abduction leads to a troubling discovery.

item.title: Singer D4vd’s Case: The Many Unanswered Questions!
item.description: A closer look at the details and lingering questions surrounding singer D4vd’s ongoing situation.

item.title: 7-Year-Old Thrown Off a Bridge, Lived to Tell the Tale
item.description: A 7-year-old survives a fall from a bridge, sharing their incredible story of resilience and recovery.

item.title: Couple Vanishes in Car Incident: Adultery Exposed
item.description: A couple goes missing following a car incident, with reports revealing a personal affair connected to the case.

item.title: The Disappearance of 4-Year-Old Athena Brownfield
item.description: Four-year-old Athena Brownfield went missing, sparking an ongoing search and investigation. A careful look at the case and efforts to find her.

item.title: Family’s Doomsday Plan Turns Criminal!
item.description: A family’s extreme survival plans escalated into illegal actions. Explore the events and consequences of their controversial choices.

item.title: Ended her Lover’s Wife and Tried to Blame her Own Husband
item.description: A woman’s affair leads to a tragic outcome as she attempts to shift the blame onto her husband. Explore the details of this intricate case.

item.title: Intrigue and Mystery Revolve Around David’s Case
item.description: Explore the ongoing investigation and unanswered questions in the intriguing case involving David.

item.title: Child Left In Hot Car For 6 Hours!
item.description: Authorities respond after a child was left inside a hot car for six hours, highlighting the dangers of heat exposure.

item.title: Man Arrested for Assaulting Over 9 Women #reelsviralシ #criminalcase #truecrimestories #tragedy
item.description: Authorities have arrested a man in connection with multiple assaults, and investigations are ongoing.

item.title: From soldier to killer: The Christian ‘Kit’ Martin case.
item.description: A look into the case of Christian ‘Kit’ Martin, examining the events that led from his military service to a criminal investigation.

item.title: Teen Boy Violates Young Girls & Gets Away With It?!
item.description: A troubling case involving a teenage boy and young girls highlights concerns about accountability and the justice system.

item.title: Into Nia Wilson’s Case: She Was 18 Years Old #reels #TrueCrime #shocking #Missingperson
item.description: A closer look at the case of Nia Wilson, who was only 18 years old when her life was tragically cut short.
